reviewText:
I'd heard many times how popular and well liked this show is but never got around to watching it.
I happened to catch the first two episodes online and immediately fell in love with the characters and the writing.
The Pilot might very well be the best written first episode I've ever seen of any show.
This is a great set with lots of extras, deleted scenes and outtakes that add to the overall enjoyment.
Not sure what price the disgruntled reviewer paid but my purchase was very reasonable and certainly less than I would have paid had I gone for the individual seasons.
To be honest, it was such a good price I was worried it might be one of those sets that includes all the episodes but no extras (I foolishly bought a 24 boxed set that disappointed like that and returned it!), but it was exactly what I hoped it would be.
I really can't imagine too many people not liking this show.
If you were considering it, buy it.
If you weren't (just as I wasn't), buy it anyway.
You won't be sorry.

If you've never seen the show, it's one of the best comedy shows in a long time. If you are unsure, it's worth purchasing a couple of individual shows.

*** Buyer Beware ***
This seller who is charging twice what it's worth. You can buy individual seasons for $17 - $22 a season.
No complaints.
Awesome sitcom.

This was cheaper then buying the videos individually which is awesome. This show is amazing and one of the best shows on tv today. I think this is the Seinfeld of the next generation but instead of about nothing, you get stuff that carries over to real life. It will be a very sad day when this show ends.

Amazing price!  I've already watched them all.  Received them very quickly, they were exactly as described.  Only quirk was that the inside CD holder is not attached to the case, but that's not the fault of the seller that's a manufacturer thing.  So I would definitely recommend this item.
This box set comes at a great price - I wish the rest of the seasons were sold at a similar value!
Perfect addition to our library. Will remain a classic
Fast delivery, great quality, great prices!  Love the extras and blooper reels!

Modern Family is the best comedy on television and at $24 for three seasons on Bluray, it's a steal! Yes, this is the UK version, but as long as you have a Bluray player and it has the latest software updates you'll have no problem. This is the same episodes and same features as the U.S. Bluray version.
Great buyer

For three seasons this was one of the best comedies ever. I've found the writing in Seasons 4 and 5 disappointing. But of course, if you buy Seasons 1-3 and like them as much as I did, you'll have to buy Season 4, hoping you won't agree with me.
This boxed set is for the UK...doesn't work in the US.I don't know if I will like the show because I can't watch it. Will be returning this product.
Great pack at great price

Show is great. But so far the WHOLE  first season on this blueray set does not work at all:( prob will be sending it back which makes me sad. I was really excited about getting it. Season 2 so far is good.

The full versions of the first 3 seasons.  Complete with bonus features and outtakes, and works on your standard us bluray player.  Great packaging and the cheapest way to acquire this very funny show.
LOVE!
thankz very much. delivery on Sundays? nobody beleived me! danny.
Hilarious series!
I just recently started watching Modern Family at the recommendation of my son and daughter-in-law, and bought seasons 1-3 to catch up.  I thoroughly enjoyed season 1 and looking forward to season 2.
Good price for three seasons.  Very funny show!
Awesomely funny
loved the show, but didn't like the format of the dvds.  cheap case and dvds looked like copies.
I enjoyed catching up on this series. The set is nice and the disks work perfectly. I just discovered this series and am looking forward to getting the next seasons.

I gave this Modern Family gift to my son.  He and his family are enjoying the old shows and hooked on the new shows.

thanks

This purchase was a Christmas gift for my husband.  He loves it.  When we don't see anything interesting on TV, we pop one of these videos in and it provides us with many laughs.

I will be ordering more seasons soon.  Amazon is a dependable company that delivers promptly.
I placed this order on line. It Came in to my door Real Fast. The Item is Exactly as Described. I like it . No Complain what so ever. Thanks.

The product was great, everything in perfect order.  Admittedly, it was frustrating that the order came in on the very last day of estimated delivery date time frame.  Clearly, that is within time frame offered and acceptable, but this is the first time that I placed an Amazon order and didn't get it within days.  BUT, there were no problems and the product was in perfect working order.
This show is absolutely hilarious! I highly recommend for anyone looking for a 20 minute comedy to watch.  The 3 season pack is put together well so it keeps the discs safe and secure.
What a great show...could not stop laughing!  Ed O'Neil does not disappoint. What a great cast, they all work well together..
Can't believe I'm writing a review for this. If you haven't watched this show and love it by now, you can be excused from life.

At the time of this review, this specific product is listed at $129.00 for seasons 1, 2, and 3 in DVD format and I'd just like anyone reading this to be aware that this is completely ridiculous. You can get the seasons individually on BLU-RAY for about 75 dollars. Modern Family: The Complete First Season [Blu-ray] Modern Family: The Complete Second Season [Blu-ray] Modern Family: The Complete Third Season [Blu-ray] That said, this is truly one of the best shows ever made.
Met expectations
Best humor and writing for a sitcom in years!
I can't get enough of this show.
Awesome show!
love this show
Awesome!!
Great buy. Fast shipping
a gift
By far the best value I could find online. Way cheaper than all the other versions online. No issues with playback or discs not working.
perfect
